name: Bigmoji
author: FlapJack
short: Uploads a large version of an emoji
description:
Uploads a large .png image of an emoji. If cairosvg is not installed, standard emojis will be limited to a 72x72 png.

Dependencies:
cairosvg :: http://cairosvg.org/ 

Windows users take note, cairosvg is difficult to install properly. Some people have had success following the Windows instructions for installing WeasyPrint (http://weasyprint.readthedocs.io/en/stable/install.html#windows), which has cairosvg as a dependency.
TODO: wand is now supported. Include instructions for installing wand / ImageMagick on windows.
